column4: hey there, running an ati radeon mobility, when i enable desktop effects, my screen goes blank, what am i missing?
also where do i find vpn connectivity with 7.04?
damn, im sure you can tho

network-manager-pptp i believe the package is called
should be in your system tray
when i say 'install' i mean, use a package manager to install it
can't firefox import a windows favourites file?
I've got over 500 favs, the BookMark Manager isnt doing much.
so importing the favouritse is unsuccessfull?
doesnt do anything, hence im asking for a program or bash script.
